Hunger and Malnutrition is a global problem. Th United Nations UN Sustainable Development Goals SDG 2 is based on that premise. Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) 2, also known as "Zero Hunger," aims to end hunger, achieve food security, improve nutrition, and promote sustainable agriculture by 2030.
Food4All seek to pair Soap kitchens and foodbanks with Local and Neighbood foodchains, restaurants, and to ensure no person is left without a meal a day while food end up in waste.
